name: Imgruber
body:
Name in homage of the un(der?)-appreciated Will Forte vehicle. Like its namesake, I expect this project to make no money.

##What even is this
Imgruber is my attempt to reduce my screenshot-to-URL time as much as possible. Its original objective was to make gamedev tweets and forum posts less time consuming to make, but can be used for whatever. Go nuts.

##How to make it do the thing
Run the program. It'll post up in your task tray. From there, double-click its icon or push Print Screen (be default). Your cursor should turn into a plus. Click and drag a rectangle. As long as you have a working internet connection, it'll upload your cropped screenshot anonymously to imgur and copy the URL directly into your clipboard.

##How to make it do the other thing
If you right click on the task tray icon and select "Configuration" you can change the hotkey.
